job description:
A well-established retailer in northern Virginia is looking to build out their data analytics team, and are in need of someone to take large amounts of data collected and transform them into microservices. The ideal candidate for this role is someone who has experience building distributedputing Big Data applications, with Spark, Storm, Kafka or NIFI. Experience with NoSQL and SQL based data stores, specifically for maintaining data pipelines and real-time reporting is a huge plus. Being a Fortune 1pany, this opportunityes with bonuses, great benefits and stock in thepany.

  • Proficient in Java/Spring
  • Experience using Kafka, Spark, Storm or NIFI
  • Experience using NoSQL and SQL databases
  • Desire to migrate into a Lead role
